channel.title: Lua on 无名的旅人
channel.description: Recent content in Lua on 无名的旅人

item.title: Lua 5.4.x CMakeLists.txt
item.description: cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.12) project(Lua) add_definitions(-DLUA_COMPAT_5_3) if(UNIX) add_definitions(-DLUA_USE_LINUX) endif(UNIX) ### force options if(WIN32) add_compile_options("$<$<C_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>:/utf-8>") add_compile_options("$<$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>:/utf-8>") endif() # see https://www.lua.org/manual/5.4/readme.html#other ### build lib set(C_FILES lapi.c lcode.c lctype.c ldebug.c ldo.c ldump.
